scripts.check:secrets: bash -c 'if grep -R "VITE_.*_KEY" src/providers 2>/dev/null | grep -v registry.meta; then echo "❌ VITE secret in client code"; exit 1; else echo "✅ No client secrets"; fi'
scripts.ci:verify: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run check:secrets && npm run test:run && npm run check:build
